title: 2 Easy Ways to Restore a Disabled Gmail Account

steps.title: Go to https://accounts.google.com/Login in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://accounts.google.com/Login in a web browser. If your account is disabled, you won't be able to sign into Google services or use "Sign in with Google". [1] X Research source

steps.title: Sign into your Google account.
steps.content: Sign into your Google account. Enter your email or phone number and your password. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Check for an explanation.
steps.content: Check for an explanation. When your account is disabled, you'll see a reason. [3] X Research source If you don't see a reason, you may need to recover or reset your password instead.

steps.title: Click Start Appeal.
steps.content: Click Start Appeal . If your account is disabled, you can request to access it again. [4] X Research source If you don't see this button, your account is not eligible for an appeal. You'll need to create a new Gmail account .

steps.title: Begin the appeal process.
steps.content: Begin the appeal process. You may be asked to provide your name, current and/or alternate email address, phone number, and an explanation regarding your account. [5] X Research source Be sure to include any relevant information, especially if your account had been hacked recently. Complete the form and click Submit . Google will review your appeal and notify you of their decision based on the contact information you entered in the form.

steps.title: Go to https://accounts.google.com/Login in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://accounts.google.com/Login in a web browser. If you don't have access your account, you may be able to download saved data from some Google Services.

steps.title: Sign into your Google account.
steps.content: Sign into your Google account. Enter your email or phone number and your password. [6] X Research source If your account was disabled due to valid legal requests, account hijacking, or content violations, you won't be able to download your data.

steps.title: Click Download Data.
steps.content: Click Download Data . This will export and download data such as: emails, documents, calendar, photos, YouTube videos, and account activity. [7] X Research source If you don't see this button, you won't be able to download your Gmail's account data. You can create a new Gmail account, or you can use a different provider, such as Outlook or Yahoo . [8] X Research source
